feed.title: Sonarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Sonarr: 4.0.9.2244
entry.content:
What's Changed

Changes

  • fix: Remove unnecessary tabs in RemoveFileExtension method by @eagnoor in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6952
  • New: Rating votes tooltip and series filter by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6954
  • More Anime Formats More Parsing Problems by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6958
  • New: Add option to show tags on series Poster and Overview by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6961
  • New: Use natural sorting for lists of items in the UI by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6962
  • Fixed: {Episode CleanTitle} Does Not Remove Apostrophe, Backtick and Most Contractions by @diamondpete in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6949
  • New: Wrap specification blocks in modals by @stevietv in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6976
  • Set default value for CustomColonReplacementFormat if not provided by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6978
  • Fixed: Assume category path from qBittorent starting with '//' is a Windows path by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6979
  • Update settings for all OSes and Major Updates (Manual Interaction Required) by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6974
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6980
  • Fix custom formats sorting for quality profiles by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6982
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6990
  • Fixed: Display tag list when sort by tags on series Posters by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6981
  • New: Litestream compatibility for SQLite by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6986
  • New: Display original language on series details and search results page by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6991
  • Refresh series with recently aired episodes with TBA titles by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6989
  • Fixed: Improve filtering performance in Select Series Modal by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7003
  • Fixed: Don't treat SubFrench as French audio language by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7004
  • Making status messages for meta downloading consistent by @ManiMatter in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7001
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7005
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7012
  • New: Replaced HasUnmonitored with Seasons Monitored Status by @jbstark in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6930
  • Fixed: Updating series path from different OS paths by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6957
  • Cache root folders and improve getting disk space for series path roots by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7006
  • Improve messaging for renamed episode files progress info by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7008
  • Bump ImageSharp to 3.1.5 by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7009
  • Fix height of tags in tag inputs by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7010
  • New: Add TVMaze and TMDB IDs to Kodi .nfo by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7011
  • Fixed: Interactive Import dropdown width on mobile by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7026
  • Include available version in update health check by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7018
  • New: Parse Chinese Anime that separates titles with vertical bar by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7019
  • Convert Blocklist, History and Queue to TypeScript by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7020
  • Convert Utilities and App to TypeScript by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7021
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7027
  • Convert System to TypeScript by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7022
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7034
  • Fixed: Allow leading/trailing spaces on non-Windows by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7028
  • New: Title filter for Series Index by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7030
  • New: Add metadata links to telegram messages by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7033
  • New: Return downloading magnets from Transmission by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7032
  • Fixed: Import with copy from download clients with remove completed disabled by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7031
  • Fixed: Setting page size in Queue, History and Blocklist by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7037
  • Fixed: Persist indexer flags when manual importing failed imports from queue by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7038
  • Fixed: Persist indexer flags for automatic imports by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7039
  • Improve messaging for for Send Notifications setting in Emby / Jellyfin by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7048
  • New: Default log level changed to debug by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7049
  • Fixed: Moving files on import for usenet clients by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7047
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7052
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7057
  • Upgrade nlog to 5.3.2 by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7051
  • Parse TvdbId for releases from HDBits by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7054
  • New: Validation for bulk series editor by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7055
  • Add special character to search criteria by @RaZaSB in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7058
  • New: Match search releases using IMDb ID by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7061
  • Fixed: Formatting empty size on disk values by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7063
  • Fix indexer multi-languages for release/push by @kephasdev in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7066
  • Fixed: Marking queued item as failed not blocking the correct Torrent Info Hash by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7071
  • Align queue action buttons on right by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7074
  • Fixed: Dedupe titles to avoid similar search requests by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7076
  • Fixed: Overwriting query params for remove item handler by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7075
  • Fixed: Clearing pending changes for edit import list exclusions on modal close by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7077
  • Fixed nlog deprecated calls by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7078
  • Fixed: Sending Manual Interaction Required notifications for unknown series by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6988
  • Cleanup old prop-types for TS by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7062
  • New: Bulk import list exclusions removal by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7073
  • New: Support for releases with absolute episode number and air date by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7080
  • Fixed: Updating existing import list exclusions by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7085
  • New: Increase max size limit for quality definitions by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7089
  • Fixed: Avoid displaying multi-languages for episodes parsed without languages by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7090
  • Fixed: Persist selected custom filter for interactive searches by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7092
  • New: Parse DarQ release group by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7093
  • Fixed: Prefer episode runtime when determining whether a file is a sample by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7094
  • Fixed: Stale custom formats after changing quality profile for series by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7098
  • Sort quality profiles by name in custom filters by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7099
  • Refactoring: Moved First run components to Typescript function components by @Treycos in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7069
  • Refactoring: Label component by @Treycos in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7097
  • Fixed: Improve status labels for deleted series by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7101
  • Fixed: Switch to series rating for Discord notifications by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7105
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7103
  • Add Kometa metadata image creation by @stevietv in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7106
  • New: Optionally include Custom Format Score for Discord On File Import notifications by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7109
  • New: Parse spanish multi-episode releases by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7108
  • Fixed: Removing invalid statuses on provider deletion by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7112
  • Fixed: PWA Manifest with URL base by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7110
  • New: Expose log size limit to API and WebUI by @martylukyy in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7111
  • Use autoprefixer in UI build by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7104
  • Fix indexer multi-languages for tracked download by @kephasdev in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7082
  • Refactoring: Series title link typings & extension by @Treycos in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7114
  • Fixed: PWA Manifest images by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7126
  • Fixed: Limit redirects after login to local paths by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7127
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7129
  • Bump version to 4.0.9 by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7139

New Contributors

  • @eagnoor made their first contribution in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6952
  • @diamondpete made their first contribution in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6949
  • @ManiMatter made their first contribution in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7001
  • @jbstark made their first contribution in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/6930
  • @RaZaSB made their first contribution in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7058
  • @kephasdev made their first contribution in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7066
  • @Treycos made their first contribution in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7069

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/compare/v4.0.8.1874...v4.0.9.2244

entry.title: New release for Sonarr: 4.0.10.2544
entry.content:
What's Changed

Changes

  • Refactoring: Typescript button component by @Treycos in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7118
  • Refactoring: Icon component Typescript by @Treycos in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7119
  • Refactoring: Link polymorphic static typing by @Treycos in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7121
  • Tech: VSCode updated code action format by @Treycos in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7124
  • Fixed: Validate root folder existence when adding series by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7128
  • Fix disabled style for monitor toggle button by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7130
  • Fixed: Handle Spaces in ProxyBypassList by @bakerboy448 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7133
  • New: Bypass IP addresses ranges in proxies by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7134
  • Fixed: Hide reboot and shutdown UI buttons on docker by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7136
  • Fixed: Paths for renamed episode files in Custom Script and Webhook by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7138
  • New: Bulk manage custom formats by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7116
  • Convert episode and season search modals to TypeScript by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7123
  • Fixed: Queue header by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7143
  • Refactoring: Icon button component Typescript by @Treycos in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7144
  • Refactoring: TableRowCell Typescript integration by @Treycos in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7145
  • Refactoring: Typescript SpinnerIcon component by @Treycos in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7146
  • Don't persist value for SslCertHash when checking for existence by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7148
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7152
  • Fixed: Generating absolute episode file paths in webhooks by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7150
  • Fixed: Forbid empty spaces in Must Contain/Must Not Contain for Release Profiles by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7151
  • Fixed: Importing files without media info available by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7156
  • Convert Components to TypeScript by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7142
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7166
  • Add Last Search Time to /episode API and to the Frontend (Cut-off Unmet & Missing) by @ManiMatter in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7091
  • Convert Interactive Search to TypeScript by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7158
  • Add IndexerFlags parsing to NewznabRssParser by @amdavie in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7160
  • New: Except language option for Language Custom Formats by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7163
  • Fixed: Failing to import any file for series if one has bad encoding by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7164
  • Cleanup History Details and a typo by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7165
  • Fixed: Respect Quality cutoff if Custom Format cutoff isn't met by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7167
  • New: Include seasons and episodes in Trakt import lists by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7171
  • Fixed: Links tooltip closing too quickly by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7172
  • New: Add MDBList link to series details by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7173
  • Convert Progress Bars to TypeScript by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7174
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7195
  • Shift quality definition limits management to the backend by @rcdailey in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7122
  • Minimum Upgrade Score for Custom Formats by @somniumV in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7161
  • Fixed: Series links not opening on iOS by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7178
  • A handful of fixes by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7184
  • New: Check for available space before grabbing by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7185
  • New: Add Bluray 576p quality by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7192
  • New: Add .zipx extension to known archive extensions by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7193
  • Gotify notification updates by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7194
  • Chore: add workflow to close issue when labelled as support by @stevietv in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7203
  • Add rating as option in sort dropdown by @stevietv in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7207
  • New: Use instance name in forms authentication cookie name by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7208
  • New: Add exception to SSL Certificate validation message by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7209
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7212
  • Refactoring: Clipboard Typescript & rewrite by @Treycos in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7168
  • Fixed: Links for Trakt and TVMaze in Gotify notifications by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7213
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7223
  • Parse KCRT as release group by @stevietv in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7215
  • New: Allowed sort keys for paginated resources by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7216
  • Fixed: Interactive searches causing multiple requests to indexers by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7217
  • fix: annotate passing apikey as query parameter consistently in description by @iMontouch in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7234
  • Adds includeSeries and includeEpisodeFile to episode endpoint (default = false) by @ManiMatter in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7219
  • Fixed: Adding Bluray 576p to some profiles by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7220
  • Fixed: Reprocessing manual import items unable to detect sample by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7222
  • New: Fetch up to 1000 series from Plex Watchlist by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7224
  • Fixed: Unable to login when instance name contained brackets by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7231
  • Fixed: Don't set last write time on episode files if difference is within the same second by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7232
  • New: Persist sort in Select Episodes modal by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7235
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7239
  • Fixed: Sorting queue by columns by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7237
  • New: Errors sending Telegram notifications when links aren't available by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7241
  • Fixed: Loading series images after placeholder in Safari by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7242
  • Fixed: Parsing of Hybrid-Remux by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7243
  • Fixed: Telegram Log Message by @RobinDadswell in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7244
  • Fix translation for Custom Colon Replacement label by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7245
  • Fixed: Ignore '.DS_Store' and '.unmanic' when scanning for files by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7247
  • Fixed: Don't reject revision upgrades if profile doesn't allow upgrades by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7257
  • Fixed: Ignore extra spaces in path when not running on Windows by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7258
  • New: Parse 'BEN THE MAN' release group by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7259
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7264
  • [DiskTransferService] WaitForIO after Copy/Move file by @jaredledvina in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7250
  • Convert Release Profiles to TypeScript by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7252
  • Fixed: Copy to clipboard in non-secure contexts by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7254
  • Fixed: Use Id from route and check for existence on provider update by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7256
  • Add new category for FL by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7267
  • Fixed: Validate path on series update by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7269
  • Fixed: Manual importing to nested series folders by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7271
  • Fixed: Clean paths for top level root folders by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7274
  • Use the first allowed quality for cutoff met rejection message with disabled upgrades by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7275
  • Fixed: Ignore free space check before grabbing if directory is missing by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7276
  • New: Use 307 redirect for requests missing URL Base by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7277
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7281
  • Convert Naming options to TypeScript by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7266
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7286
  • Bump version to 4.0.10 by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7322

New Contributors

  • @amdavie made their first contribution in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7160
  • @somniumV made their first contribution in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7161
  • @iMontouch made their first contribution in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7234
  • @jaredledvina made their first contribution in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7250

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/compare/v4.0.9.2244...v4.0.10.2544

entry.title: New release for Sonarr: 4.0.11.2680
entry.content:
What's Changed

Changes

  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7332
  • Use OperatingSystem class to get OS information by @HadrienPatte in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7249
  • Fixed: Matched alternative titles and tags in header search results by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7285
  • Fixed: Dedupe releases for single daily and anime episode searches by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7289
  • Bump frontend packages by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7291
  • Include exception message in SkyHook failure message by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7292
  • New: Display items tags on import lists index by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7293
  • New: Sync updates to UI for providers by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7296
  • Natural sorting for tags list in the UI by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7297
  • Inherit trigger from pushed command models by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7304
  • Improve message for grab errors due to no matching tags by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7306
  • Cleanse exceptions in event logs by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7308
  • Fix settings fetching failure for updates by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7310
  • Fixed: Stopped/Started as initial state for qBittorrent v5.0 by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7313
  • Fixed: Changing series to another root folder without moving files by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7319
  • New: Maintain '...' in naming format by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7323
  • New: Improve parsing absolute followed by standard numbering by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7324
  • New: Episode mappings in .plexmatch metadata files by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7325
  • Update JetBrains logos by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7326
  • Fixed: Status output root folders for completed directories in Deluge by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7328
  • [CVE-2024-43485] Update System.Text.Json to version 6.0.10 / Fix the build using dotnet-sdk 8.x. by @BarbUk in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7329
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7333
  • Convert Form Components to TypeScript by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7327
  • Update paths mapping translations for series specific by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7314
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7352
  • New: Use instance name in PWA manifest by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7334
  • Fixed: Parse version after quality in renamed files by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7335
  • New: Add individual edit to Manage Custom Formats by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7336
  • New: Favorite folders in Manual Import by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7338
  • Fixed: Use download client name for history column by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7340
  • New: Include source path with Webhook import event episode file by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7341
  • Fixed: Cleaning the French preposition 'à' from titles by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7343
  • Fixed: Loading queue with pending releases for deleted series by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7344
  • Fixed: New values for custom filters by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7348
  • Fixed: Root folder existence for import lists health check by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7351
  • New: Monitor New Seasons column for series list by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7354
  • New: Reject files during import that have no audio tracks by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7355
  • New: Filter queue by status by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7356
  • Show a series path as example in Mount Health Check by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7357
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7359
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7366
  • New: Labels support for Transmission by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7303
  • Fixed: Normalize unicode characters when comparing paths for equality by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7358
  • Console warnings for missing translations on development builds by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7361
  • Fixed: .plexmatch episodes on separate lines by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7363
  • New: Improve stored UI settings for multiple instances under the same host by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7370
  • New: Add headers in webhook connection by @gauthier-th in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7371
  • New: Parse original from release name when specified by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7372
  • Fixed: Allow files to be moved from Torrent Blackhole even when remove is disabled by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7375
  • New: Replace 'Ben the Man' release group parsing with 'Ben the Men' by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7377
  • Improve LanguageSelectInput and fix EnhancedSelectInput by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7376
  • fix: Allow GetFileSize to follow symlinks by @eliasbenb in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7378
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7390
  • Fixed: Custom Format upgrading not respecting 'Upgrades Allowed' by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7412
  • Bump version to 4.0.11 by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7419

New Contributors

  • @HadrienPatte made their first contribution in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7249
  • @BarbUk made their first contribution in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7329
  • @eliasbenb made their first contribution in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7378

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/compare/v4.0.10.2544...v4.0.11.2680

entry.title: New release for Sonarr: 4.0.12.2823
entry.content:
What's Changed

Changes

  • Rename SizeLeft and TimeLeft queue item properties by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7395
  • Fixed: Kometa and Kodi metadata failing with duplicate episode files by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7396
  • Fixed: New episodes in season follow season's monitored status by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7402
  • Deluge communication improvements by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7403
  • New: Support for new SABnzbd history retention values by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7408
  • New: Ability to change root folder when editing series by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7410
  • Fixed: Truncating long text in the middle when it shouldn't be truncated by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7414
  • Support Postgres with non-standard version string by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7415
  • Fixed: Error loading queue by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7425
  • Fixed: Avoid default category on existing Transmission configurations by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7426
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7428
  • Tweak text-wrapping for title and overview in series view by @hhjuhl in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7388
  • Option to treat downloads with non-media extensions as failed by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7397
  • New: Additional language fields in webhook notification by @stevietv in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7434
  • New: Add opt-in CGNAT support for authentication bypass by @s0up4200 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7436
  • Fixed: Don't fail import if symlink target can't be resolved by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7439
  • New: Kometa metadata file creation disabled by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7440
  • Remove unnecessary heap allocations in local IP check by @Gylesie in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7441
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7445
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7448
  • Cleanup unused metadatas connector by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7447
  • New: Reactive search button on Wanted pages by @stevietv in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7450
  • Fixed: Custom Format score bypassing upgrades not being allowed by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7460
  • Refine localization string for IndexerSettingsFailDownloadsHelpText by @stevietv in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7462
  • Convert MediaInfo to TypeScript by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7464
  • Fixed: Converting TimeSpan from database by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7465
  • New: Append Instance Name optionally to Telegram notifications by @stevietv in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7466
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7473
  • Fixed: Fetching ICS calendar with missing series by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7468
  • Convert Calendar to TypeScript by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7477
  • Fixed: Series without tags bypassing tags on Download Client by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7478
  • Fixed: Error getting processes in some cases by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7479
  • Fixed: Augmenting languages from indexer for release with stale indexer ID by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7480
  • Fixed: Refresh backup list on deletion by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7481
  • New: Series genres for search results by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7485
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7490
  • Fixed: Opening episode info modal on calendar event click by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7487
  • Set minor version for core-js in babel/preset-env by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7488
  • Upgrade babel and Font Awesome by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7489
  • Fixed: Loading calendar on older browsers by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7493
  • Fix: adding a new root folder from series edit modal by @stevietv in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7496
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7503
  • Fixed: Prevent exception when grabbing unparsable release by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7499
  • Bump MailKit to 4.8.0 and Microsoft.Data.SqlClient to 2.1.7 by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7502
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7513
  • Fixed: Prevent exception for seed configuration provider with invalid indexer ID by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7509
  • Fixed: Series updated during Import List Sync not reflected in the UI by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7512
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7516
  • Fixed: Advanced settings for Metadata consumers by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7515
  • Raw search: Fix non-anime seasons and episodes not searching with clean titles by @meharryp in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7517
  • Don't send session information to Sentry by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7522
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7524
  • Fixed: Improve synchronization logic for import list items by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7521
  • Suggest adding IP to RPC whitelist for on failed Transmission auth by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7525
  • Check if backup folder is writable on backup by @mynameisbogdan in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7529
  • Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7536
  • Bump version to 4.0.12 by @markus101 in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7544

New Contributors

  • @hhjuhl made their first contribution in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7388
  • @s0up4200 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7436
  • @meharryp made their first contribution in https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/pull/7517

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Sonarr/Sonarr/compare/v4.0.11.2680...v4.0.12.2823
